author: Sara Silverstein
title: Ian Bremmer breaks down Trump's response to the coronavirus crisis — where he has been a profound failure and where he has been among the best in the world
description: Eurasia Group president Ian Bremmer says in the face of the coronavirus pandemic, Trump been a profound failure in two ways. First, the president has been a communications disaster and provided false hope that led to a later start in social distancing. Second…
content: United States foreign policy expert Ian Bremmer is the president of the Eurasia Group and GZERO Media. He spoke to Business Insider's Sara Silverstein about how the coronavirus pandemic will impact the presidential election and relations between the US and Ch… [+20959 chars]
